General.Name: Lotte Chilsung Beverage
General.Description: Lotte Chilsung Beverage Co., Ltd. produces and sells beverages and liquor items in South Korea. The company offers carbonated beverages, juices, coffee, tea, and spring water; and alcoholic beverages, such as soju, beer, spirits, fruit liquor, wine, and cooking wine. It exports its products into Russia, China, Southeast Asia, and Latin America. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Lotte Castle Gold, Seoul, South Korea
